io.micronaut.cache

Class DefaultCacheConfiguration

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.micronaut.cache.CacheConfiguration
      • io.micronaut.cache.DefaultCacheConfiguration

  • @EachProperty(value="micronaut.caches")
public class DefaultCacheConfiguration
extends CacheConfiguration
    Default cache configuration implementation used to configure instances of DefaultSyncCache.

    1.0.2
    Author:
